   program main

   implicit none

   integer :: n, i, m, min_val, ans, second_output

   integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a

   ! Read first program's input

   read(*,*) n

   if (n ==1) then

           ans =0

       else

           m =n

               new_m =0

               do j=1, m

                   if (a(j) /=0) then

                       new_m = new_m +1

                       a(new_m) = a(j)

                   end if

               end do

               m = new_m

               if (m ==0) then

                   ans =0

                   exit

               end if

               ! Step 2: find min_val

               min_val = a(1)

               do j=2, m

                   if (a(j) < min_val) min_val = a(j)

               end do

               ! Step 3: process each element, check for 1

               logical :: found_one = .false.

               do j=1, m

                   integer :: new_val

                   new_val = mod(a(j), min_val)

                   if (new_val ==1) then

                       ans =1

                       found_one = .true.

                       exit

                   end if

                   a(j) = new_val

               end do

               if (found_one) exit

       second_output =0

   else

       second_output =1

   end if

   ! Third program's processing: output as string

   write(*,'(i0)') second_output

   contains

   subroutine sort(arr, size)

       integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)

       integer, intent(in) :: size

       integer :: i, j, temp

       do i =1, size-1

           do j =i+1, size

               if (arr(i) > arr(j)) then

                   temp = arr(i)

                   arr(i) = arr(j)

                   arr(j) = temp

               end if

           end do

       end do

   end subroutine sort

   end program main
